Rulings.Base:
1. You check the names of the Fusion Material Monsters while they are in the GY.
2. Even if a Fusion Material Monster used for this card is not a Reptile-Type "Worm" monster after it is in the GY, it is still counted when determining which effects this card gets.
3. The effects gained are cumulative.
4. If this card is flipped face-down by "Book of Moon" its ATK becomes 0 and it loses all effects gained from its Fusion Summon.
5. The effect to Special Summon a Reptile-Type monster targets.
6. Removing 1 Reptile-Type monster from play is a cost.
